Thailand-Cambodia Clashes: Both Countries Agree on Weapons Withdrawal to Ease Tensions
Thailand-Cambodia Clashes: Both Countries Agree on Weapons Withdrawal to Ease Tensions
Edited By
WION Video Desk
Published:
Sep 11, 2025, 17:51 IST
| Updated:
Sep 11, 2025, 17:51 IST
Thai-Cambodia: Cambodia and Thailand have agreed to gradually pull back heavy weapons from their disputed border and collaborate on landmine clearance, key steps in easing tensions after July clashes that killed dozens.
